mapper.sql: id, vin, production_order, matnr, project, sales_area, body_form, config_level, model_year, steering_wheel_position, interior_type, exterior_color, drive_form, wheel, whee_color, seat_type, assisted_driving, etc_system, rear_tow_bar, engine_no, engine_type, front_drive_motor_no, front_drive_motor_type, rear_drive_motor_no, rear_drive_motor_type, generator_no, generator_type, power_battery_pack_no, power_battery_type, power_battery_factory, description, create_time, create_by, modify_time, modify_by, row_version, row_valid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_veh_detail_info ( id, vin, production_order, matnr, project, sales_area, body_form, config_level, model_year, steering_wheel_position, interior_type, exterior_color, drive_form, wheel, whee_color, seat_type, assisted_driving, etc_system, rear_tow_bar, engine_no, engine_type, front_drive_motor_no, front_drive_motor_type, rear_drive_motor_no, rear_drive_motor_type, generator_no, generator_type, power_battery_pack_no, power_battery_type, power_battery_factory, description, create_time, create_by, modify_time, modify_by, row_version, row_valid ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{vin}, #{productionOrder}, #{matnr}, #{project}, #{salesArea}, #{bodyForm}, #{configLevel}, #{modelYear}, #{steeringWheelPosition}, #{interiorType}, #{exteriorColor}, #{driveForm}, #{wheel}, #{wheeColor}, #{seatType}, #{assistedDriving}, #{etcSystem}, #{rearTowBar}, #{engineNo}, #{engineType}, #{frontDriveMotorNo}, #{frontDriveMotorType}, #{rearDriveMotorNo}, #{rearDriveMotorType}, #{generatorNo}, #{generatorType}, #{powerBatteryPackNo}, #{powerBatteryType}, #{powerBatteryFactory}, #{description}, now(), #{createBy}, now(), #{modifyBy}, 1, 1 )

INSERT INTO tb_veh_detail_info ( id, vin, production_order, matnr, project, sales_area, body_form, config_level, model_year, steering_wheel_position, interior_type, exterior_color, drive_form, wheel, whee_color, seat_type, assisted_driving, etc_system, rear_tow_bar, engine_no, engine_type, front_drive_motor_no, front_drive_motor_type, rear_drive_motor_no, rear_drive_motor_type, generator_no, generator_type, power_battery_pack_no, power_battery_type, power_battery_factory, description, create_time, create_by, modify_time, modify_by, row_version, row_valid ) VALUES
( #{item.id}, #{item.vin}, #{item.productionOrder}, #{item.matnr}, #{item.project}, #{item.salesArea}, #{item.bodyForm}, #{item.configLevel}, #{item.modelYear}, #{item.steeringWheelPosition}, #{item.interiorType}, #{item.exteriorColor}, #{item.driveForm}, #{item.wheel}, #{item.wheeColor}, #{item.seatType}, #{item.assistedDriving}, #{item.etcSystem}, #{item.rearTowBar}, #{item.engineNo}, #{item.engineType}, #{item.frontDriveMotorNo}, #{item.frontDriveMotorType}, #{item.rearDriveMotorNo}, #{item.rearDriveMotorType}, #{item.generatorNo}, #{item.generatorType}, #{item.powerBatteryPackNo}, #{item.powerBatteryType}, #{item.powerBatteryFactory}, #{item.description}, now(), #{item.createBy}, now(), #{item.modifyBy}, 1, 1 )
mapper.update:
UPDATE tb_veh_detail_info t SET
t.vin = #{vin},
t.production_order = #{productionOrder},
t.matnr = #{matnr},
t.project = #{project},
t.sales_area = #{salesArea},
t.body_form = #{bodyForm},
t.config_level = #{configLevel},
t.model_year = #{modelYear},
t.steering_wheel_position = #{steeringWheelPosition},
t.interior_type = #{interiorType},
t.exterior_color = #{exteriorColor},
t.drive_form = #{driveForm},
t.wheel = #{wheel},
t.whee_color = #{wheeColor},
t.seat_type = #{seatType},
t.assisted_driving = #{assistedDriving},
t.etc_system = #{etcSystem},
t.rear_tow_bar = #{rearTowBar},
t.engine_no = #{engineNo},
t.engine_type = #{engineType},
t.front_drive_motor_no = #{frontDriveMotorNo},
t.front_drive_motor_type = #{frontDriveMotorType},
t.rear_drive_motor_no = #{rearDriveMotorNo},
t.rear_drive_motor_type = #{rearDriveMotorType},
t.generator_no = #{generatorNo},
t.generator_type = #{generatorType},
t.power_battery_pack_no = #{powerBatteryPackNo},
t.power_battery_type = #{powerBatteryType},
t.power_battery_factory = #{powerBatteryFactory},
t.description = #{description},
t.modify_by = #{modifyBy},
t.row_version = t.row_version + 1, t.modify_time = now() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE tb_veh_detail_info t SET t.row_version = t.row_version + 1, t.modify_time = now(), t.row_valid = 0 WHERE t.id = #{value}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_veh_detail_info t WHERE t.id = #{value}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM tb_veh_detail_info t WHERE t.id = #{value} AND t.row_valid = 1

SELECT FROM tb_veh_detail_info t WHERE t.row_valid = 1
ORDER BY t.id DESC
SELECT FROM tb_veh_detail_info t WHERE t.row_valid = 1 AND t.vin = #{vin} LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_veh_detail_info t WHERE t.row_valid = 1
